name: Galaxy Chaos (Ishir)
description:
You have to shoot the aliens Invading, Once a UFO is killed,it is respawned at the top, The objective is to kill as many UFOs as you can. The UFOs randomly drop bombs at you. If you get Hit by them you die. You also die if one of the UFO reaches really close to you so don't let them get close.

Controls:
left and right arrow for moving left and right

space bar to shoot a bullet

R to retry the game once you are dead

Hope You Enjoy my Classis Arcade Game!
